scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint Michael, clad in ornate golden armor and mail, with feathered wings, standing over a defeated dragon. He holds a sword aloft, poised to strike the creature. The dragon, depicted with blue and yellow scales, lies prostrate on the ground, its mouth open and tongue extended. In the background, a grey, weathered stone structure, possibly a column or a ruined building, is visible amidst green foliage. The scene is framed by an illuminated border featuring floral motifs.
